resources.string: This app is developed for themepark \"De Essteling\". The goal of this application is to entertain people in the queue of the rides. There is also an option to bring information about queue times etc.
How can I launch a game?

You can launch games from the home-menu. Once your device is connected to a specific attraction, it will appear under "nearby attractions". If you tap the name of the attraction or the big purple "play" button next to it, the game will launch. This app connects to attractions with Bluetooth, so make sure Bluetooth is enabled.
Where can I view my highscore?
You can see your highscore in the game-over screen of a game.
How does the game of Anaconda work?

In Anaconda you play as a snake with gold fever. The aim of the game is eating as many gold coins as possible. The snake will get longer every time you eat a coin. If you want the snake to go in a certain direction, simply swipe in that direction. The snake is also able to leave the playing field. It will return from the opposite side.
Where can I see the scores of a specific attraction?
There is a tab called "Attractions" in the navigation menu. This will bring you to a list of attractions. You can view the scores of an attraction by tapping on that attraction.
